PD_FRIENDLIST_SETTINGS.INFO_MODAL_NOTE: Toggles the functionality of the information button within the DM list on favorited friends
PD_FRIENDLIST_SETTINGS.SORT_OPTIONS_NOTE: Have sort options in the friend list
PD_FRIENDLIST_SETTINGS.MUTUAL_GUILDS_NOTE: Show mutual guilds in the friend list

PD_NOTIF_SOUND_SETTINGS.NOTE:
Customize notification sounds specifically for favorited friends.
You can put a link to an MP3 file in the textbox, or leave it blank to play the default sound
